HelpBalloon.title: Add status of recipients for the following mailing lists
HelpBalloon.content:
Here you can output the recipient status for any mailing lists for the addresses to be exported (selection in the "Select recipients for export" section). The recipient status is displayed numerically and can have the following values:
Value: 1 ; Status: active
Value: 2 ; Status: Bounce
Value: 3 ; Status: Opt-out by Admin
Value: 4 ; Status: Opt-out by recipient
Value: 5 ; Status: Waiting for double-opt-in-conformation
Value: 6 ; Status: On blocklist
Value: 7 ; Status: Temporarily inactive
